titlestmt.titleproper:
Sean Delonas Collection of Cartoons from the New York Post,
1990-2013
PR 313

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2017-04-24T16:58-0400

did.unittitle: Sean Delonas collection of cartoons from the New York Post
did.abstract: This collection consists of 113 original drawings of cartoons by Sean Delonas that were published by the New York Post's Page Six between 1990-2013.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Note
acqinfo.p: Gift of the artist, Sean Delonas, March 14, 2015.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Open to qualified researchers by appointment only. Contact librarian at printroom@nyhistory.org
Photocopying undertaken by staff only. Limited to twenty exposures of stable, unbound material per day.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Application to use images from this collection for publication should be made in writing to:
Department of Rights and Reproductions The New-York Historical Society 170 Central Park West, New York, NY 10024-5194 rightsandrepro@nyhistory.org 212-485-9228

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Sean Delonas is an American political cartoonist, painter and illustrator. His cartoons were published by the New York Post as part of their Page Six content from 1990-2013.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents Note
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 113 original drawings of cartoons by Sean Delonas that appeared on Page Six of the New York Post between 1990-2013.

did.unittitle: 113 cartoons by Sean Delonas, published in the New York Post
